column1: #Text=Bolin says : " I do n't know if we can win this fight . "
#Text=Mako says : " We do n't need to win , we just need to stop Unalaq from getting back in the Spirit World . "
#Text=Tenzin says : " We 're walking in circles , I 've seen that same spirit mushroom five times . "
#Text=Bumi says : " That 's not the same mushroom . "
#Text=" Spirit mushroom says : " No , was n't me .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " How did you know we were here ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " My friendly spirit fox told me you were lost , I came to show you the way out .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Iroh , we are grateful , but we 're not looking for the way out .
#Text=" Iroh says : " I 'm sorry to hear that .
#Text=But you should n't be here , Vaatu has escaped and darkness threatens to take over .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I 'm not leaving until I find Jinora .
#Text=But I beg you to be careful , if you travel too deep into the Spirit World , you could end up in a place where only the lost will ever find you .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " A place where only the lost can find you ... ?
